issue.title: [CF 1381] Showcase
issue.body:
Hey Cybeloras.

 

I wanted to show you something that I made with no LUA code. I don't believe it is possible to make something this awesome with any other addon (without using LUA).

 

All the addons out there that help with rotations, and the helpers designed in WA and in TMW are always extremely lacking (especially when it comes to range DPS since it gets complicated when cast times are involved).

 

So I decided to make a rotation helper for Boomkins in TMW using no LUA code at all.

 

I made this video in legion BETA so its very outdated but still shows what is possible with your addon.

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1GWP-Y8HKKM

 

Hope you enjoy.


> Posted by CurseForge user bobthegoat2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1381 | Raw

comments.body:
That's awesome, thanks for sharing!

Edited Feb 17, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
